entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
